author: Rahul
text: Hey team, export feature for Client A is failing with a 500 error. Anyone aware of changes pushed last night?

author: Amit
text: Hmm, I deployed a minor update in the export service. Could be related.

author: Rahul
text: Yep, they have an event today, kinda urgent.

author: Amit
text: Checking logs... seeing a null pointer exception in ExportController. Will patch and redeploy in 20 min.

author: Vikram
text: Let’s add null checks in config mapping; this might happen for other clients too.

author: Amit
text: Patch deployed. Rahul, can you retry?

author: Rahul
text: Just tested. Export works now. Thanks all!

author: Priya
text: Submission fails for Client B. The form just hangs after clicking Submit.

author: Amit
text: Seeing any errors in console/network logs?

author: Priya
text: Console shows 400 Bad Request for /submitForm endpoint.

author: Vikram
text: This may be due to missing 'participantType' in payload. We recently made it mandatory.

author: Amit
text: Adding fallback logic to auto-set participantType='General' if missing. Hotfix in 15 min.

author: Priya
text: Retested. Form submission works now. Will inform Client B team.

author: Rahul
text: Funding step fails for Client A → "You cannot proceed with this transaction right now".

author: Amit
text: Logs show gateway timeout for sandbox environment.

author: Vikram
text: Maybe retry logic not working properly?

author: Amit
text: Yes, retries stop after 1 attempt due to wrong config. Will fix to allow 3 retries with backoff.

author: Rahul
text: Retesting... Works after fix. Funding completes.

author: Priya
text: For Client C, app submission sends it to review queue instead of auto-approval. Config issue?

author: Vikram
text: Config flag in DB might be overridden by default rules in backend.

author: Amit
text: Found the issue. AutoApprove flag read from old config table, not the new one. Fixing query now.

author: Priya
text: After fix, submissions go through without review. All good.

author: Rahul
text: Seeing "NullReferenceException in PaymentService" for Client C in today’s logs.

author: Amit
text: Might be due to null card details in sandbox mode.

author: Vikram
text: Add guard clauses for null values. Also log participantId for traceability.

author: Amit
text: Fixed code and added more context logs. Patch deployed.

author: Rahul
text: Logs look clean now. No more exceptions.
